abstract: The new Facebook application for the Rhapsody music service shows some of the advantages of integrating powerful applications into Facebook’s environment.
snippet: The new Facebook application for the Rhapsody music service shows some of the advantages of integrating powerful applications into Facebook’s environment.
lead_paragraph: Rhapsody, the music service, just introduced its Facebook application. It’s easy to skip past this, because everybody has a Facebook app these days. But it’s worth a look because the experience shows that an application on Facebook can have much more usefulness than Zombies and SuperPoke.
